name: Jay's stupid & Dumb Jam Game (MZ week 1 jam)
name_original: Jay's stupid & Dumb Jam Game (MZ week 1 jam)
description:
On August 20th of 2020, a new entry in the RPG maker line of game engines released known as "RPG Maker MZ" to celebrate, me and my friend Majik made two seperate games in a week.

Jay's stupid and dumb jam game is a short little adventure where you explore a wide variety of islands, and by wide variety, i mean two. Fight bosses, mini-bosses, and shadows as you try to find out what lies at the bottom of the "Temple of the Ocean Gay". This game is a joke don't take it seriously.
